    python3新浪微博数据爬虫

    FunkyRicky    2015 - 2021

    python3新浪微博数据爬虫

    FunkyRicky 2019/2/1 爬虫

    # python3新浪微博数据爬虫

    # weibo多用户请求版本.py

    import requests
import json
import time as times
import random



class weiboSpider():
    def __init__(self):
        self.url="http://m.weibo.cn"
        self.data={}
        pass


    # 获取用户主页信息
    def get_info(self,uid):

        self.uid=uid
        url="https://m.weibo.cn/api/container/getIndex?containerid=230283{0}_-_INFO&title=%25E5%259F%25BA%25E6%259C%25AC%25E4%25BF%25A1%25E6%2581%25AF&luicode=10000011&lfid=230283{1}&featurecode=20000320".format(uid,uid)

        headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/62.0.3202.62 Safari/537.36'}
        # 访问用户信息界面

        try:

            response=requests.get(url=url,headers=headers)

            response.encoding='utf-8'
            # print(response.json())
            my_dict=response.json()
            # print(my_dict)
            # dict_info=my_dict[0].get('cards')[0].get('card_group')
            dict_info=my_dict.get('data').get('cards')[0].get('card_group')
            # print(dict_info)
            # return
        except Exception as e:
            print("获取用户信息异常！",e)
            return



        #用户名
        self.name=None
        # 认证信息
        self.renzheng=None
        # 简介
        self.jianjie=None


        self.name = dict_info[0].get("item_content")
        self.jianjie = dict_info[-1].get("item_content")
        for i in dict_info:
            for j in i.items():
                if j[0]=="item_type" and j[1]=="verify_yellow":
                    self.renzheng=i.get("item_content")


        print("昵称:",self.name)
        print("认证信息:",self.renzheng)
        print("简介:",self.jianjie)

        self.data['name']=self.name
        self.data['认证信息']=self.renzheng
        self.data['简介']=self.jianjie

        pass


    # 获取用户微博信息
    def get_weibo(self):




        "1005055568378787_-_FOLLOWERS"
        # "100103type%3D3%26q%3D1690076015"
        page=1
        # lfid 需要观察
        url="https://m.weibo.cn/api/container/getIndex?uid={0}&luicode=10000012&lfid=1005055568378787_-_FOLLOWERS&featurecode=20000320&type=uid&value={1}&containerid=107603{2}&page={3}".format(self.uid,self.uid,self.uid,page)

        headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/62.0.3202.62 Safari/537.36'}
        try:
            response=requests.get(url=url,headers=headers)
            response.encoding='utf-8'
            data_dict=response.json()
            data_dict=data_dict.get('data')
            times.sleep(random.randint(0,10)*0.1)
        except Exception as e:
            print("获取信息异常！",e)
            return
        flag=1

        # 微博总数
        total=data_dict.get('cardlistInfo').get('total')
        print(total)
        self.data['总数']=total
        # 用户微博头像url
        self.img_url=data_dict.get('cards')[0].get('mblog').get('user').get('profile_image_url')
        print("头像url:",self.img_url)
        data_list=[]
        while 1:
            try:
                # 可能会变化
                url = "https://m.weibo.cn/api/container/getIndex?uid={0}&luicode=10000012&lfid=1005055568378787_-_FOLLOWERS&featurecode=20000320&type=uid&value={1}&containerid=107603{2}&page={3}".format(
                    self.uid, self.uid, self.uid, page)

                response1 = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers)
                response1.encoding = 'utf-8'
                data_dict1 = response1.json()
                data_info=data_dict1.get('data').get('cards')
                if data_dict1.get('ok')==0:
                    break

            except Exception as e:
                print("获取信息异常！", e)
                break



            for i in data_info:
                flag += 1
                text=""
                time=""
                img_url=[]
                mblog_json=None

                #mblog数据
                try:
                    mblog_json=i.get('mblog')
                    mblog_json=json.dumps(mblog)
                except Exception as e:
                    print("获取mblog失败！",e)


                # 微博信息
                try:
                    mblog = i.get('mblog')
                    text=mblog['text']
                except Exception as e:
                    print("获取信息失败！", e)


                # 微博时间
                try:

                    mblog = i.get('mblog')
                    time=mblog['created_at']

                except Exception as e:
                    print("获取时间失败！", e)

                # 获取图片url集合
                try:
                    mblog=i.get('mblog')
                    img_iist=mblog['pics']
                    for i in img_iist:
                        img_url.append(i['url'])
                except Exception as e:
                    print("没有图片可以获取",e)

                # 测试用
                print("时间:  ",time)
                print("信息:  ",text)
                print("img地址:",img_url)
                data_list.append({'info':text,'img_url':img_url,'time':time})

            if flag >= total-10:
                print("爬取微博成功！")
                break
            else:
                print("获取下一页！")
                page+=1
                times.sleep(random.randint(0, 10) * 0.2)
                print("总数是多少条了---------------------",len(data_list))


        self.data['weibo']=data_list

        print("OK")
        return json.dumps(self.data,indent=4,ensure_ascii=False)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    weibo = weiboSpider()
    # 这里传入uid
    weibo.get_info('2369700880')
    weibo.get_weibo()



    pass

    # 单人版 php请求 py脚本相应

    from http.server import HTTPServer, BaseHTTPRequestHandler
from datetime import datetime
import json
import urllib.request
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup as bs
import os
import re

# JSONP = 'getMessage(["customername1","customername2"])'
# j = json.loads(re.findall(r'^\w+\((.*)\)$', JSONP)[0])
# print(type(j), j)
data = "hello world"

host = ('localhost', 8080)


def get_weibo(uid, weiboData):
    url = 'https://weibo.cn/u/' + uid
    cookie = "_T_WM=23e7e90fde4abc69978e23cf86de3e41; ALF=1527861733; SCF=AhSaMWt1QOaqUTakA7Uah8HgDAZaC_75Glo29aseh6NdmtwB2jTGm2m_KJWxdUk-t3UulMrx35woAkDd98eXbD8.; SUB=_2A2537blvDeRhGeNI4lUR9irMwziIHXVVEccnrDV6PUJbktANLUHGkW1NS-0oXlHsxhGUOsyJ46UD8p2Bo2crDSbp; SUBP=0033WrSXqPxfM725Ws9jqgMF55529P9D9W5s.LfSR.7zd4IkilPJJDmB5JpX5K-hUgL.Fo-c1KM7SoB71hB2dJLoI7yG9gHVxrHVI7tt; SUHB=05iq-WlHw6sCsf; SSOLoginState=1525270847"
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/63.0.3239.108 Safari/537.36', 'Cookie': cookie}
    r = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    soup = bs(r.text, 'html.parser')
    # 所访问的微博用户名
    weibo_user_name = soup.find('title').text.replace('的微博', '')
    # 微博总页数,通过审查元素可知
    if soup.find('input', attrs={'name': 'mp'}) is None:
        exit(0)
    totalPage = int(soup.find('input', attrs={'name': 'mp'}).attrs['value'])
    print('总共检测到%d页微博页面' % totalPage)
    # 每页微博的URL的列表
    weibo_urlList = [url + '?filter=0&page=' +
                     str(i + 1) for i in range(totalPage)]

    weiboData.append([weibo_user_name])
    #当前已爬取的图片总数
    pictrue_num = 0

    #当前已爬取的图片总数
    pictrue_num = 0
    for page, weibo_url in enumerate(weibo_urlList):
        r = requests.get(weibo_url, headers=headers)
        soup = bs(r.text, 'html.parser')
        #每条微博所对应的标签代码块列表
        weibo_tags_list = soup.find_all('div', attrs={'class': 'c'}, id=True)
        #微博发送时间与微博配图的字典
        imgs_urls_dic = []
        for entry, weibo_tag in enumerate(weibo_tags_list):
            print('正在爬取第%d页第%d条微博' % (page + 1, entry + 1))
            weibo_content = ' '.join(weibo_tag.find(
                'span', attrs={'class': 'ctt'}).text.replace('\xa0', ' ').split(' '))
            #获取微博发送时间
            hms = ' '.join(weibo_tag.find(
                'span', attrs={'class': 'ct'}).text.replace('\xa0', ' ').replace(':', '-').split(' ')[:2])
            #该条微博若带有组图，获取组图中所有图片的URL
            if weibo_tag.find('a', text=re.compile('组图')):
                imgs_url = weibo_tag.find('a', text=re.compile('组图')).attrs['href']
                html = requests.get(imgs_url, headers=headers)
                imgs_soup = bs(html.text, 'html.parser')
                imgs_tags_List = imgs_soup.find_all('img', alt='图片加载中...')
                img_urls_list = [imgs_tag.attrs['src'].replace(
                    'thumb180', 'large') for imgs_tag in imgs_tags_List]
                imgs_urls_dic.append([img_urls_list, hms, weibo_content])
            #该条微博仅有一张配图，或者没有图片，获取图片的URL
            else:
                img_tags_List = weibo_tag.find_all('img', alt='图片')
                img_urls_list = [img_tag.attrs['src'].replace(
                    'wap180', 'large') for img_tag in img_tags_List]
                imgs_urls_dic.append([img_urls_list, hms, weibo_content])
        weiboData.append(imgs_urls_dic)


class Resquest(BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
    def do_GET(self):
        self.queryString = urllib.parse.unquote(self.path.split('?', 1)[1])
        #name=str(bytes(params['name'][0],'GBK'),'utf-8')
        params = urllib.parse.parse_qs(self.queryString)
        id = params['weiboId'][0];
        weiboData = [];
        self.send_response(200)
        self.send_header('Content-type', 'application/json')
        self.end_headers()
        get_weibo(id, weiboData)
        self.wfile.write(json.dumps(weiboData).encode())
        # self.wfile.write(weiboData)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    server = HTTPServer(host, Resquest)
    print("Starting server, listen at: %s:%s" % host)
    server.serve_forever()
